title: Deals: 16-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro falls to new low of $250 off, iPhone 12 refurb $480, more
content:
All of today’s best Apple deals have arrived on this fine Tuesday and are headlined by a new low for Apple’s 16-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro at $250 off. That’s alongside a 1-day refurbished iPhone 12 discount to $480 and Eve’s new HomeKit Weather Station with Thread at $70. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: 16-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro falls to new low of $250 off, iPhone 12 refurb $480, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: All of today's best Apple deals are headlined by a $250 discount on the 16-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro at a new Amazon low. Plus more!
